column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Their Sunday brunch was the perfect end of the weekend meal. Started with their Breakfast in Bed shot: shot of jimmy dean bourbon with maple syrup
column2: followed by a shot of orange juice
column3: followed by a stick of bacon. This will be my much needed liquid courage (I'm currently sitting in a tattoo chair waiting to get my first ever tattoo
column4: and it's gonna be a big one)
